001001 00000 00001 0000000000000001     # addi $r0 $r1 1
110100 00001 00001 0000000000000000     # mtc1 $r1 $f1
111100 00001 00010 0000000000000000     # cvt.s.w $f1 $f2
000001 00010 000000000000000000000      # asrt.s $f2
00111111100000000000000000000000

001001 00000 00001 0000000000101010     # addi $r0 $r1 42
110100 00001 00001 0000000000000000     # mtc1 $r1 $f1
111100 00001 00010 0000000000000000     # cvt.s.w $f1 $f2
000001 00010 000000000000000000000      # asrt.s $f2
01000010001010000000000000000000

001001 00000 00001 1111111111010110     # addi $r0 $r1 -42
110100 00001 00001 0000000000000000     # mtc1 $r1 $f1
111100 00001 00010 0000000000000000     # cvt.s.w $f1 $f2
000001 00010 000000000000000000000      # asrt.s $f2
11000010001010000000000000000000

000101 00000 00000 0000000000000000     # halt
